body: Hi Chris, I have to disagree with your B answer. You can't simulate an individual hour in E+. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/aNZ9EZ3f4*xjbrlkcV5rGdseDKdQOJkocrKt1ZP0XIs5tgs5OPHUYAfNqsLN2cOknvkOt6eZT-R8KaPQSYavAd6jTuZoXzJS/Capture.JPG)As you can see, there is no option for lower resolution than daily. But just to be sure, i tried your solution in attached one of the CSV results. You get the whole day ... which includes the hours (of course). -A.
